text: Nanci Caroline Griffith (July 6, 1953 â€“ August 13, 2021) was an American country folk singer-songwriter and guitarist. Griffith appeared many times on the PBS music program Austin City Limits. Griffith was born in Seguin, Texas. Her career lasted from 1977 until 2013. Griffith won a Grammy Award in 1994. Griffith died on August 13, 2021 in Nashville, Tennessee at the age of 68. ==References== Category:1953 births Category:2021 deaths Category:American Grammy Award winners Category:American folk singers Category:American country guitarists Category:American country singers Category:American folk musicians Category:Singer-songwriters from Texas Category:Musicians from Nashville, Tennessee Category:Singers from Nashville, Tennessee Category:Writers from Nashville, Tennessee Category:Musicians from Austin, Texas Category:Singers from Austin, Texas
title: Nanci Griffith
